object.name: GCSControlCommand
object.description: The output from the @ref ManualControlModule which descodes the receiver inputs. Overriden by GCS for fly-by-wire control.

field.name: Roll
field.units: Scalar (-127 to 127) 128 WILL BE READ AS 127

field.name: Pitch
field.units: Scalar (-127 to 127) 128 WILL BE READ AS 127

field.name: Yaw
field.units: Scalar (-127 to 127) 128 WILL BE READ AS 127
